main.name: Melody Lo
main.description: I am a Sydney based Web Developer. I use react to develop pages. Welcome to my portfolio
main.bio: My name is Melody Lo. I am a Junior Web Developer and I am an accomplished coder and programmer. I enjoy using my skills to solve real life problems and build functional websites. I graduated from the University of Sydney The Coding Bootcamp in 2020 with a Master's Degree in Nuclear Medicine. While in the bootcamp, I applied the knowledge that I have learned, and created several functional websites. I have experience in using HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, API, Express, Node.js, React, mySQL, Bootstrap, and responsive design. I am obsessed with building websites that are highly interactive and with beautiful UI. I spend most of my free time developing my own project. I enjoy watching sci-fi movies and animation, looking into new tech products online, working out and eating nice food at local restaurants.

education.school: The University of Sydney Coding Bootcamp
education.description: Throughout the course, I have learned many technical skills like coding with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, web API, Ajax, Node.js, React, mySQL, MongoDB, and Bootstrap

I have gained multiple clinical skills specifically for Nuclear Medicine, as well as developed effective communication skills, team work understanding, time management and outstanding problem solving abilities

work.title: Want to Watch Manager
work.description: Want-to-Watch Movie Manager is a website which allows users to search movies available in the market and keep track of them. My role in the team was the project lead. I contributed to the website by applying knowledge of omdbAPI, mySQL and applied Google Dialogflow chatbot. Tools: Node.js, Express, EJS, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, Heroku, Dialogflow, omdb API, JQuery, Passport, Bootstrap. Find project details on GitHub: https://github.com/roukell/Want-to-Watch-Series-Manager

work.title: V-bloggers Around You
work.description: V-bloggers Around You allows business owners to search local youtubers who can help them promote their business. I contributed to the website by applying Google map and Youtube API. Created user workflow chart and organised presentation slides. Tools: HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery fb, Foundation, Google map API, Youtube API, Canva. Find project details on GitHub: https://github.com/roukell/vbloggers_around_you
